fields.localized_string: Laboratories are where science and creativity meet to develop, research, and explore new ideas. Mozilla Labs embraces this great tradition — a virtual lab where people come together to create, experiment, and play with new Web innovations and technologies. Mozilla Labs is about inspiring and harnessing the intelligence, wisdom, and energy of the Mozilla community; let’s imagine the future of the Web, and then let’s build it together. All are welcome. Come play.
fields.localized_string_clean: Laboratories are where science and creativity meet to develop, research, and explore new ideas. Mozilla Labs embraces this great tradition — a virtual lab where people come together to create, experiment, and play with new Web innovations and technologies. Mozilla Labs is about inspiring and harnessing the intelligence, wisdom, and energy of the Mozilla community; let’s imagine the future of the Web, and then let’s build it together. All are welcome. Come play.

fields.localized_string:
How to enable themes and personas:

1) Type 'about:config' into the URL bar and press enter. 
2) Right click on any of the attributes listed in preference list
3) Click New => Boolean
4) Enter 'lightweightThemes.forceSkinning' for the name
5) Set initial value to true

Doing this will allow themes and personas to be applied simultaneously, but many will not display personas properly. It is the responsibility of the theme designer to modify their theme to work with personas properly.
fields.localized_string_clean:
How to enable themes and personas:

1) Type 'about:config' into the URL bar and press enter. 
2) Right click on any of the attributes listed in preference list
3) Click New => Boolean
4) Enter 'lightweightThemes.forceSkinning' for the name
5) Set initial value to true

Doing this will allow themes and personas to be applied simultaneously, but many will not display personas properly. It is the responsibility of the theme designer to modify their theme to work with personas properly.

fields.localized_string: Free, easy-to-install "skins" for Firefox. Choose from over 180,000 cool designs, including art from Harry Potter and Bob Marley.  Join over 8 million people from around the world who are asking themselves: "What Will My Browser Wear Today?"
fields.localized_string_clean: Free, easy-to-install "skins" for Firefox. Choose from over 180,000 cool designs, including art from Harry Potter and Bob Marley.  Join over 8 million people from around the world who are asking themselves: "What Will My Browser Wear Today?"

fields.localized_string:
Personas are free, easy-to-install "skins" for Firefox. Choose from over 180,000 cool designs, including art from Harry Potter, Bob Marley and Lady Gaga to individualize your browser.  Join over 20 million people from around the world who are asking themselves: "What Will My Browser Wear Today?"

* Easy to install, easy to switch designs to suit your mood
* 180,000+ design available from 5,000+ individual artists and brands from around the world
* Featuring exclusive designs from:
      - your favorite bands (All American Rejects, No Doubt, Lady Gaga, Bob Marley, etc.)
      - your favorites movies (Harry Potter, Fame, etc.)
      - your favorite television shows (Project Runway, It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia, etc.)
      - your favorite causes (Greenpace, Livestrong, etc.)
      - your favorite fashion brands (Vans, BCBG, H&M, Anna Sui, etc.)
      - and many more!

If you love this add-on, check out Personas Rotator: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/60914/ , a new companion for Personas Firefox add-on to change your beloved Personas skins periodically on Firefox.
fields.localized_string_clean: Personas are free, easy-to-install "skins" for Firefox. Choose from over 180,000 cool designs, including art from Harry Potter, Bob Marley and Lady Gaga to individualize your browser. If you love this add-on, check out Personas Rotator: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/60914/ , a new companion for Personas Firefox add-on to change your beloved Personas skins periodically on Firefox.
